prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum.  They banned any parental feedback and deferred to the activist themselves to review it and approve it, despite the fact that it heavily promotes gender diasphora, and the fantasies of Ben Levin.

These totalitarians operate under the guise of gaining equality for a supposed marginalized group, but are willing to go scorched earth with your children to get what they want.  If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.
stories:
Numerous disturbing trends are emerging as activists find sympathetic ears among corrupt politicians, such as Kathleen Wynne. One notable example is their attempt to suppress a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous professional who was unfairly maligned by career-driven, taxpayer-funded social justice warriors and militants. Similarly, they manipulated the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum, ignoring parental input and instead relying on activist approval, despite its promotion of gender dysphoria and the ideology of Ben Levin.

Under the pretense of advocating for a supposedly marginalized group, these totalitarian individuals are willing to sacrifice children's well-being to achieve their goals. Those who dissent are labeled homophobic or ignorant, but when confronted to provide scientific evidence, they resort to peddling flawed research and personal attacks.

A concerning pattern is emerging where activists are gaining influence with corrupt politicians, such as Kathleen Wynne, to push their agenda. A striking instance of this is their effort to censor a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave expert who was unfairly targeted by radical, state-funded ideologues. Similarly, they hijacked the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum, disregarding parental feedback and instead seeking approval from activists, despite its promotion of harmful gender ideologies and the beliefs of Ben Levin.

Under the guise of championing a supposedly vulnerable group, these authoritarian individuals are willing to compromise children's welfare to achieve their objectives. Those who oppose them are quickly branded as homophobic or uninformed, but when challenged to provide scientific proof, they resort to disseminating flawed studies and personal insults.

A disturbing trend is unfolding, where activists are exerting undue influence over corrupt government officials, such as Kathleen Wynne, to advance their own agenda. A notable example of this is their campaign to suppress a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous expert who was unfairly attacked by radical, state-funded ideologues. Similarly, they manipulated the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum, disregarding parental input and instead seeking validation from activists, despite promoting harmful gender ideologies and the beliefs of Ben Levin.

Under the pretence of advocating for a marginalized group, these authoritarian individuals are willing to sacrifice children's well-being to achieve their goals. Those who disagree with them are quickly labelled as homophobic or ignorant, but when pressed to provide scientific evidence, they resort to spreading flawed research and personal attacks.

A concerning pattern is emerging, where special interest groups are wielding disproportionate power over compromised government officials, such as Kathleen Wynne, to push their own ideology. A striking illustration of this is their efforts to censor a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave expert who was unfairly targeted by radical, state-backed ideologues. Similarly, they manipulated the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum, disregarding parental input and instead seeking endorsement from activists, despite promoting harmful gender theories and the beliefs of Ben Levin.

Under the guise of promoting the rights of a vulnerable group, these authoritarian individuals are willing to compromise the well-being of children to achieve their objectives. Those who dissent from their views are quickly branded as homophobic or uninformed, but when challenged to provide scientific proof, they resort to disseminating flawed research and personal attacks.

A disturbing trend is developing, where influential lobby groups are exerting undue influence over susceptible government officials, such as Kathleen Wynne, to advance their own agendas. A notable example of this is their attempts to suppress a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a courageous expert who was unjustly targeted by radical, government-backed ideologues. Similarly, they manipulated the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum, ignoring parental input and instead seeking approval from activists, despite promoting harmful gender ideologies and the beliefs of Ben Levin.

Those who disagree with their views are quickly labeled as homophobic or uninformed, but when pressed for scientific evidence, they resort to disseminating flawed research and launching personal attacks.

A troubling pattern is emerging, where powerful special interest groups are exerting undue influence over certain politicians, including Kathleen Wynne, to promote their own agendas. A striking example of this is their efforts to suppress a documentary about Dr. Zucker, a brave expert who was unfairly targeted by rigid, government-supported ideologues. Similarly, they meddled with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum, ignoring parental concerns and seeking validation from activists instead, despite promoting harmful gender ideologies and the views of Ben Levin.
